properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 09.
1. VESSEL, 50 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
   IN VICINITY 33-53.20N 023-03.70E AT 270848Z JUL.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
   TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO JRCC LIBYA,
   PHONE: 2189 1034 9739, 2182 1444 9149,
   2182 1717 3377, 2182 1444 9488,
   FAX: 2182 1360 6868,
   E-MAIL: SAR@ANS.CAA.GOV.LY,
   LMRCC.1@MOD.GOV.LY,
   LCG.OPS.RM@MOD.GOV.LY.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1861/22.
